column1: Appendix table 4. Number of sentenced prisoners admitted and released from state or federal jurisdiction, by region and jurisdiction, 2000, 2006, 2007
Authors: Heather C. West and William J. Sabol, Ph.D.
Appendix table 4. Number of sentenced prisoners admitted and released from state or federal jurisdiction, by region and jurisdiction, 2000, 2006, 2007
Note: Totals exclude transfers, escapees, and AWOLs.
a/2007 counts were estimated. See Methodology.
b/A change in the reporting in 2004 excluded unsentenced prisoners and those sentenced to less than 1 year.
